attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Talacre Railway station is situated on the North Wales Coast Mainline and is a vital Link, to which is Key to Tourists and locals alike, Re-opening this Station would give the Village itself and the Villages/area around it a vital link to towns and citys such as; Bangor, Holyhead, Llandudno, Rhyl, Prestatyn (the nearest town), Chester, Manchester, Liverpool, Crewe and even London. Please sign this petiton and make it happen.
